Pork.name: Bacon Wrapped Hotdogs
steps: Preheat your grill or oven to medium-high heat.
Take a slice of bacon and wrap it around a hotdog, starting at one end and wrapping it all the way to the other end. Repeat with remaining hotdogs.
Place the bacon-wrapped hotdogs on the grill or on a baking sheet in the oven.
Cook the hotdogs for about 10-12 minutes, or until the bacon is crispy and the hotdogs are heated through.
Once cooked, remove the hotdogs from the grill or oven and let them cool for a few minutes.
Serve the hotdogs in buns with your favorite condiments.
Pork.instructions: This is how you make a bacon wrapped hotdog
Pork.description: This is a Bacon Wrapped Hotdogs
